DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center observational study assess addition Rituximab treatment previously untreated patient Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphomas ( DLBCL ) enrollment period 60 month . Patients study enrol collection data observation make normal clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Diffuse Large B Cell Primary Breast Lymphomas Treated With RCHOP +/- XRT
DOC.criteria: Previously untreated patient DLBCL breast . Patients must CD20 positive tumor . Stage IE IIE . Must least one objective measurable evaluable disease . Baseline measurement evaluation must obtain within 4 week registration study . Patients must historical radiographic evidence CNS metastasis include previously treat , resect asymptomatic brain lesion leptomeningeal involvement . Patients must ECOG performance status 02 . Patients must adequate organ function evidence follow laboratory study ( within 2 week prior registration ) : Creatinine Clearance > = 50 ml/min Total bilirubin < = 2.0 mg/dl AST < = 2 x upper limit normal . If document hepatic involvement lymphoma , total bilirubin < = 3 x *ULN , AST < = 5 x ULN . Absolute neutrophil count > = 1500/mm3 platelet count > = 100,000/mm3 . If document bone marrow involvement lymphoma , absolute neutrophil count > = 500/mm^3 platelet count > = 50,000/mm^3 . Patients must age > = 18 year . Women must pregnant breast feeding due potential harmful effect fetus/baby . Women childbearing potential sexually active male strongly advise use accept effective method contraception . Patients must active infection require parental antibiotic . Patients know HIV infection exclude . Patients must normal leave ventricular ejection fraction eligible .
